column4: I would like to do a fresh install of ubuntu.  Is there a way to save everything in my home directory, and possibly, the preferences on some applications, so that I can easily transport them to the freshly installed ubuntu?
Okay so it's okay to burn a copy of my home folder to a CD and then do a fresh install and move the data into the new home folder?
Does that save preferences like firefox settings?
you can also copy /home contents to a USB drive if your /home isn't too big
